description:
Enter the sleek, modern hall of Masters Pool - the ultimate 8-ball billiards experience for console players. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned cue master, this game will bring precision, style and competitiveness to your fingertips.

Game modes :

- Single player - Take on three distinct levels of AI difficulty, from beginner to professional. Perfect your strokes, hone your strategy and move up the ranks.
- Tournament mode - Take on a series of AI opponents in high-level competition. Each match becomes increasingly difficult as you strive to become the undisputed Masters champion.
- Local multiplayer - Share the fun with a friend in classic 1 vs 1 matches on the same console. No lag, no waiting, just pure, unadulterated action.

Features:

- Modern, atmospheric billiards site with clean graphics and immersive sound design
- Realistic physics and intuitive controls for an authentic 8-ball experience
- Sharp AI that adapts to your playing style, offering a new challenge with every game.

Whether you're lining up your first shot or chasing the last black ball to win, Masters Pool is your table, your rules. Are you ready to break?
